qmmm.help: QM/MM with the Thole MM model for excited states

mapping.help: XML file with multipole moments and polarizabilities

emp_file.help: Allocation of .mps file to segments, run 'stateserver' with key = 'emp' to create a template

write_chk.help: XYZ file with dipoles split onto point charges

split_dpl.help: '0' do not split dipoles onto point charges, '1' do split

dpl_spacing.help: Spacing to be used when splitting dipole onto point charges: d = q * a

dftpackage.help: DFT package to use for the QM region

gwbse.help: Specify if GW/BSE excited state calculation ist needed

state.help: Number of excited state, which is to be calculated

type.help: Character of the excited state to be calculated

filter.help: Filter with which to find the excited state after each calculation

oscillator_strength.help: Oscillator strength filter, only states with higher oscillator strength are considered

charge_transfer.help: Charge transfer filter , only states with charge transfer above threshold are consdered

dE_QM.help: Energy change of the QM region

dE_MM.help: Energy change of the MM region

cutoff1.help: Cut-off for the polarizable MM1 shell

cutoff2.help: Cut-off for the static MM2 shell

induce_intra_pair.help: '1' - include mutual interaction of induced dipoles in the QM region. '0' - do not

convergence.help: Convergence parameters for the MM1 (polarizable) region

wSOR_N.help: Mixing factor for the succesive overrelaxation algorithm for a neutral QM region

wSOR_C.help: Mixing factor for the succesive overrelaxation algorithm for a charged QM region

max_iter.help: Maximal number of iterations to converge induced dipoles

tolerance.help: Maximum RMS change allowed in induced dipoles
